DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety concomitant administration ASP1941 metformin patient diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Safety ASP1941 Combination With Metformin Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate efficacy ( HbA1c change baseline ) safety ASP1941 combination metformin subject type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) inadequate glycemic control metformin alone . The effect ASP1941 compare placebo .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patient receive metformin monotherapy least 6 week HbA1c value 7.0 9.5 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 20.0 45.0 kg/m2 Type 1 diabetes mellitus patient Serum creatinine > upper limit normal Estimated GFR < 60ml/min/1.73m2 Proteinuria ( albumin/creatinine ratio > 300mg/g ) Dysuria and/or urinary tract infection , genital infection Significant renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease Severe gastrointestinal disease
